name: Mesh2Cap
description: Crowdsourcing annotation web app for describing ScanNet objects

scripts.build: mkdir -p ./client/build && browserify ./client/js/apps/Main/Main.js ./client/js/apps/ErrorPage/ErrorPage.js ./client/js/apps/MeshViewer/MeshViewer.js ./client/js/apps/Common/Common.js ./client/js/apps/Tutorial/Tutorial.js --standalone Base -o ./client/build/Bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch: mkdir -p ./client/build && watchify ./client/js/apps/Main/Main.js ./client/js/apps/ErrorPage/ErrorPage.js ./client/js/apps/MeshVerify/MeshVerify.js ./client/js/apps/MeshSelect/MeshSelect.js ./client/js/apps/MeshViewer/MeshViewer.js ./client/js/apps/MeshViewerObject/MeshViewerobject.js ./client/js/apps/MeshViewerPart/MeshViewerpart.js ./client/js/apps/MeshViewerRoom/MeshViewerroom.js ./client/js/apps/MeshViewerhumancheck/MeshViewerhumancheck.js ./client/js/apps/MeshViewerhumando/MeshViewerhumando.js ./client/js/apps/SG3D/SG3D.js ./client/js/apps/SQAChecker/SQAChecker.js ./client/js/apps/Tutorial/Tutorial.js ./client/js/apps/MeshAnnotator/MeshAnnotator.js ./client/js/apps/Common/Common.js --standalone Base -o ./client/build/Bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --debug --verbose

author: Dave Zhenyu Chen
